description: If you want to learn more about custom class loading on the Dalvik VM check out the official blog post from the Android development blog.
title: Custom Class Loading in Dalvik

description: Facebook has released a very interesting post on their engineering blog. The article deals which efforts they had to take to make their huge code base running on Android 2.2 with custom class loading. It a crazy, dare we say insane, piece of engineering and you should definetly check it out.
title: Dalvik patch for Facebook for Android

description: Do you share our dream that iterating a feature across the whole stack from UI to backend, should be as easy as a walk in the park? Do you love Android? Do you to be part of figuring out and architecting infrastructure that will fulfill our dream? Let's chat!

description: We want to improve people's relationship to music massively. We want to develop the most loved music service on Android. We believe in thinking holistically, using metrics, A/B tests, interviewing, and other ways to validate and tweak our ideas. Interested?
